summary: Armor Replacer designed to mimic Katia Managan's armor (from prequeladventure.com).  CBBE version requires separate optional file for blue pants.  Latest (CHSBHC) version does not.
descriptionHtml:
I've learned a lot since I originally made this mod last year. I just uploaded an update to this mod that improves it substantially over the earlier mod. First, this mod is for the CHSBHC body. It supports breast "jiggle" therefore. Also, the blue pants are now included - no need for a separate mod for that, (which caused all female khajiits to wear blue pants all the time).

Also, the back now conforms to the "canon" version as seen in Prequel Adventure webcomic.

Since this update is for CHSBHC, that mod is a prerequisite. Not really sure what would happen if you didn't have it installed first.

Required:
Cherry Hotaling's CHSBHC body mod - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4888

Suggested:
MrLenski's CoverKhajiits mod (for improved face) - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5941
Tktk's Pretty Khajiit (for big eyes) - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17040
Crashmaster Jmm & Derok's Female Khajiit Tail Fix (moves tail up out of CHSBHC's larger butt) - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46491
My optional Katia Nude texture mod (here) - (mostly just makes female khajiits more yellow and gives them a pale chest area as in Katia's design)

HOW TO USE:

This is an armor replacer. Specifically it replaces Linwe's armor. I chose that to replace primarily because it's fairly rare, so you won't end up seeing lots of people walking around in Katia's armor. You can either get it from Linwe by quest: (A light armor similar to the Thieves Guild Armor or Guild Master's Armor Set, obtained by looting or pickpocketing Linwe at Uttering Hills Cave) OR you can cheat via this at the console:
player.additem 00108544 1

WHAT TO EXPECT:
If you then don the Linwe armor, you'll get Katia's armor.

WHAT NOT TO EXPECT:
Perfection. I'm getting some clipping when at higher weight sizes. Pretty minor IMHO.

THANKS TO:
Cherry Hotaling for CHSBHC. Still the sexiest mod in my opinion and the first with breast jiggle.
MrLenski, for outlandishly detailed textures!
Tktk, for Pretty Khajiit mod and nice, big eyes that inspired the idea that a somewhat Katia-like player character COULD be done.
Crashmaster Jmm & Derok - for tail mover, really needed for CHSBHC Khajiits!
KAZERAD - for making prequeladventure.com and such a lovable character as Katia, enough to get me off my butt and try and make this thing!

HOW TO INSTALL:
I tested it with Nexus Mod Manager and it appears to work as expected, but I'm personally a fan of doing these things manually sometimes. Just extract and copy the data folder into your main game folder.

STILL TO COME:
A couple thing's I'd LIKE to do. Whether or not I actually will is another question. First, the blue bodysuit is so form-fitting that its...well... it's paint essentially. I'll need to learn 3ds max better to be able to adjust that and get the suit out of her ass. In fact, I like it this way but I'm weird like that. I'd also like to fix the clipping issues.

ADULT ONLY?
I removed the Katia texture mod file so that I can un-adult-only this mod.

BLUE BODY SUIT OPTIONAL MOD
My older attempt at this required an optional Blue Body Suit mod to look right. This one (CHSBHC) doesn't. But since I'm leaving the CBBE version up, I'll leave that up to. Sort of obsolete in my opinion though.

1 - Install CHSBHC mod. (required for breast animation)
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4888
2 - Install CoverKhajiits. (optional for much nicer Khajiit faces)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5941
3 - Install Pretty Khajiit. (optional for big eyes like Katia)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17040
4 - Install Tail Fix mod (optional but your kitty may squeal if you don't get that tail out of her butt!).

Obtain Linwe armor either in-game or via console command shown above. Wear armor. See Katia armor. Profit.
author: Bluedraggy

files.name: Katia Managan Armor V1 - CBBE version.  Blue undersuit not included
Katia Blue Bodysuit for V1 CBBE
